title: Initial Meeting - Discuss Project Goals
body: Discuss overall project goals, scope, and potential challenges. Participants: James, Juergen, Scott. Duration: 30 minutes

title: Requirement Gathering
body: Identify key software components and architecture to be included in the MVP. Participants: James. Estimated Time: 2-3 hours

title: Minimal Schematic Creation
body: Juergen to develop a basic schematic for web use. Participants: Juergen. Estimated Time: 1-2 hours

title: Schematic Review and Feedback
body: James to provide feedback and suggestions on the schematic. Participants: James, Juergen. Estimated Time: 1 hour

title: Component Documentation
body: Document each main component, gather all relevant metadata including the coordinates. Participants: James, Juergen. Estimated Time: 5-10 hours

title: Prototype Development
body: Create a basic web interface for the schematic. Participants: James (or designated web developer). Estimated Time: 5-10 hours

title: Interface Testing and Iteration
body: Test the interface for usability and make necessary improvements. Participants: James, Juergen, Scott. Estimated Time: 5-10 hours

title: Development Environment Setup
body: Establish a suitable development environment. Participants: James. Estimated Time: 2 hours

title: Production Provisioning
body: Prepare the production environment. Participants: James. Estimated Time: 1 hour

title: JIRA and Git Hosting Setup
body: Set up project management and version control systems. Participants: James. Estimated Time: 1.5 hours

title: Analytics Setup
body: Implement tracking and analytics tools. Participants: James. Estimated Time: 2 hours

title: Securing Software Assets
body: Focus on server-side coding and embedding critical functionalities within the app. Approach: Explore and implement security measures. Participants: James and possibly external experts. Timing: Post-core development

title: Final Review and Testing
body: Ensure everything is working seamlessly and efficiently. Participants: James, Juergen, Scott. Estimated Time: 3-4 hours

title: Launch
body: Make the interface live and monitor initial user interactions. Participants: James, Juergen, Scott. Estimated Time: 2-3 hours

title: Regular Updates and Maintenance
body: Address any issues, update content, and improve features based on user feedback. Participants: James, Juergen. Estimated Time: Ongoing
